text: Allah tana pravaktaku a nagaravasula nundi ippincina danilo (phaya lo) allah ku mariyu ayana pravaktaku mariyu atani daggari bandhuvulaku mariyu anathulaku mariyu pedalaku mariyu batasarulaku hakku undi. Adi milo dhanavantulaina vari madhyane tiragakunda undataniki, ila nirnayincabadindi. Mariyu pravakta miku iccina danini tisukondi mariyu atanu miku nisedhincina daniki duranga undandi. Allah patla bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Niscayanga, allah siksincatanlo cala kathinudu
